name: Hexa Puzzle Hero
description:
Just drag and drop all the Hexa Blocks on the board. The rule is simple: everything must fit!

Keep your brain active and sharp, analyze all the possibilites and try to finish all puzzles without using the hint button. In total there are hundreds of free levels, all categorized according to their size, their complexity and the number of hexa block on the board.

Features:
- The most simple gameplay: drag & drop!
- Hundreds of challenging levels and more to come
- Stuck? Just use the hint button
